summary.title: Learn TypeScript
summary.description: TypeScript is an open-source object-oriented language developed and maintained by Microsoft, licensed under Apache 2 license. It is a typed superset of Javascript that compiles to plain JavaScript. TypeScript was developed under Anders Hejlsberg, who also led the creation of the C# language. TypeScript was first released in October 2012.

levels.title: Install TypeScript and Setup Environment
levels.content: NPM (Node.js package manager) is used to install the TypeScript package on your local machine or a project. Make sure you have Node.js install on your local machine. If you are using JavaScript frameworks for your application, then it is highly recommended to install Node.js.

steps.content: NPM install the "typescript" library module version.
